description.full: Go on!  Do it!  Spend those points!  Hurry up!: time is of the essence. Someone has to take care of all those zombies and who better to do that than a gifted gamer like yourself!  Think - in a short while - you could be blasting your way through ranks of brain-hungry monsters, making bizarre weapons and completing crazy quests. All that could be yours if you just buy the game!  Remember, All Zombies Must Die!  We need you!
description.short: Boom, headshot! You’re all that stands between 6 billion zombies and the world’s supply of delicious, supple head-candy. Guide up to four players through the town of Deadhill and blast your way through ranks of brain-hungry monsters, making bizarre weapons and completing crazy quests. Imagine non-stop action vs the fun bits of an RPG, including classes, levelling, crafting, loot and an unrelenting, undead army. So reload your shotguns and lock up your brains: All Zombies Must Die!
